title: $:/plugins/dyp/Rider
name: Rider
author: dyp
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/dyp/Rider/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/Rider/readme","created":"20250502163809725","modified":"20250502163820868","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目 "},"$:/plugins/dyp/Rider/usage":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/Rider/usage","created":"20250502163917556","modified":"20250502164005124","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; 写法 ``` <$transclude $variable="rider" tiddler="条目名称"/> ``` 或 ``` <> ``` "},"A tiddler to nest riders":{"title":"A tiddler to nest riders","created":"20200815222311899","modified":"20240405073325656","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Here is some text belonging to [[A tiddler to nest riders]]. <> The above sentence was text belonging to [[Third level rider]]"},"Rider demo stylesheet tweaks":{"title":"Rider demo stylesheet tweaks","created":"20200816183500381","modified":"20240504165604011","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":".rider { background: #DEB88732; padding: 0.4em; border: 1px solid maroon; }"},"Rider-A wanderer":{"title":"Rider-A wanderer","created":"20200814144530696","modified":"20240405114312083","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"This tiddler is entitled [[Rider-A wanderer]]. It is embedded into the tiddler [[Rider-Example]], by the ''Rider'' plugin. * I made... * ...this list using the [[Editor Autolists|https://saqimtiaz.github.io/sq-tw/editor-autolists.html]] plugin by Saq Imtiaz, which I have installed in this wiki * Even though I don't have a list to list * Because it was fun"},"Rider-Acknowledgements":{"title":"Rider-Acknowledgements","created":"20200816205957081","modified":"20240405072801110","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"This plugin owes its existence to: * [[Jeremy Ruston|https://github.com/Jermolene]] who created (and continues to create) [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com]] * everyone who contributes their time and expertise at the [[TiddlyWiki Google Group|https://groups.google.com/g/tiddlywiki]] Thanks for specific feedback on this plugin goes to Google Group users Birthe C and Atronoush. "},"Rider-Changelog":{"title":"Rider-Changelog","created":"20200816152848666","modified":"20240405072615446","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"''16 August 2020 - Rider plugin v0.0.2'' * Remove "click-text-to-edit" button to fix broken text selection * Remove negative right margin on `.rider` elements to make styling less brittle * Make edit button an edit/cancel toggle and move submit button to below editor * Add demonstration of custom CSS styling"},"Rider-Example":{"title":"Rider-Example","created":"20200815221315347","modified":"20240419033706389","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"''示例1：'' <> """ language:"tw">> ''结果1 （编辑请点击右上角的<<.icon $:/core/images/edit-button>>图标）:'' <> ''示例2：'' 尝试再嵌套另一个条目： <> """ language:"tw">> ''结果2:'' <>"},"Rider-Further notes":{"title":"Rider-Further notes","created":"20200815222118671","modified":"20240405072816461","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"* There is ''no undo'', nor is there a confirmation when submitting or abandoning changes. * Enabling the Editor Toolbar activates a lot of functionality in the editor, beyond the obvious formatting, including [[excising text into a new tiddler|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Using%20Excise]] and editor operation plugins like Saq Imtiaz's freaky-fun [[Editor Autolists|https://saqimtiaz.github.io/sq-tw/editor-autolists.html]], which is also demoed in [[Dave Gifford's Stroll|https://giffmex.org/stroll/goodies.html#Outliner]]. * The text editor preview mode is not implemented within the ''rider'' plugin. * Nesting any sort of transclusion opens the possibility of recursion errors."},"Rider-Interacting with the transcluded tiddler":{"title":"Rider-Interacting with the transcluded tiddler","created":"20200815222134543","modified":"20240405072809446","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!!Activating an editor for the transcluded tiddler ''Mouse:'' Click on the text of the transcluded tiddler, or the <<.icon $:/core/images/edit-button>> icon. !!Saving changes to the tiddler ''Mouse:'' Click the <<.icon $:/plugins/can/rider/fastarrow.svg>> icon. ''Keyboard:'' Cmd+Enter or Ctrl+Enter (unless the `((save-tiddler))` shortcut has been changed) !!Abandoning changes to the tiddler and closing the interface ''Mouse:'' Click the <<.icon $:/plugins/can/rider/escape.svg>> icon. ''Keyboard:'' Escape (unless the `((cancel-edit-tiddler))` keyboard shortcut has been changed) !!Opening the transcluded tiddler in the Story River ''Mouse:'' Click the title link at the top right of the transcluded tiddler."},"Rider-Styling":{"title":"Rider-Styling","created":"20200816183607993","modified":"20240405075056468","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"The ''rider'' plugin has no explicitly-configurable options, but, this being ~TiddlyWiki, users can override CSS rules to suit their preferences. As a demonstration, the demo wiki contains the tiddler [[Rider demo stylesheet tweaks]], which gives some sample CSS rules for an alternate look. This tiddler can, of course, be edited to achieve the desired result. The following button toggles the <<.tag '~$:/tags/Stylesheet'>> tag on [[Rider demo stylesheet tweaks]], to compare default and custom styling: {{Style tweaks toggle}} Here is the example tiddler again: <>"},"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目教程":{"title":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目教程","created":"20200815214430341","modified":"20240504163527950","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目 教程","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"< """ language:"tw">> <> """ language:"tw">> ''This plugin is not extensively tested. Back up any data you don't want to lose. That applies even if you aren't going to try this plugin.'' ''Rider'' is a small [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com]] plugin for transcluding tiddlers with some in-place editing capability. The ''Rider'' plugin exposes one macro: ''rider''. The ''rider'' macro takes one parameter: ;tiddler : The title of the tiddler to transclude !!Example (in a transcluded tiddler) <> The <<.def rider>> macro follows your [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com]]'s [[Control Panel|$:/ControlPanel]] settings as to whether or not to show the Editor Toolbar. ''Further reading:'' * [[Interacting with the transcluded tiddler|Rider-Interacting with the transcluded tiddler]] * [[Styling|Rider-Styling]] * [[Further notes|Rider-Further notes]] * [[Changelog|Rider-Changelog]] * [[Acknowledgements|Rider-Acknowledgements]] "},"Style tweaks toggle":{"title":"Style tweaks toggle","created":"20200816201603099","modified":"20240405113432786","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$button> <$list filter='[[Rider demo stylesheet tweaks]!tag[$:/tags/Stylesheet]]'> <$action-listops $tiddler='Rider demo stylesheet tweaks' $tags='$:/tags/Stylesheet'/> Apply stylesheet tweaks <$list filter='[[Rider demo stylesheet tweaks]tag[$:/tags/Stylesheet]]'> <$action-listops $tiddler='Rider demo stylesheet tweaks' $tags='-[[$:/tags/Stylesheet]]'/> Remove stylesheet tweaks "},"Third level rider":{"title":"Third level rider","created":"20200815221120574","modified":"20240405073325660","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Another level of nesting. This text belongs to [[Third level rider]]. Try clicking its <<.icon $:/core/images/edit-button>> button."},"rider/action-macros":{"title":"rider/action-macros","modified":"20240405112521724","tags":"$:/tags/Macro rider插件","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define rider-toggle-edit() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> editstate="edit"/> \define rider-toggle-view() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> editstate="view"/> \define rider-startedit-actions() <><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{!!text}}/> \define rider-submitedit-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/> \define rider-canceledit-actions() <$action-setfield text={{$(editstatetid)$}} $timestamp='no'/><> "},"rider/escape.svg":{"title":"rider/escape.svg","created":"20200704020624739","modified":"20240405112521727","tags":"rider插件","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" "},"rider/fastarrow.svg":{"title":"rider/fastarrow.svg","created":"20200815174850339","modified":"20240405112521730","tags":"rider插件","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" "},"rider/fish-water.svg":{"title":"rider/fish-water.svg","modified":"20240405112521732","tags":"rider插件","text":" "},"rider/license":{"title":"rider/license","caption":"license","modified":"20240405112521735","tags":"rider插件","text":"BSD 3-Clause License Copyright (c) 2020, Chris Nicoll All rights reserved. Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met: 1. Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer. 2. Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution. 3. Neither the name of the copyright holder nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from this software without specific prior written permission. THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE."},"rider/macros":{"title":"rider/macros","created":"20240405113140387","modified":"20240419035138933","tags":"$:/tags/Macro rider插件","text":"\whitespace trim \define rider-editstatetid() <> \define rider(tiddler) <$list filter="[[$tiddler$]]"> <> \end \define rider-template() <$vars editstatetid=$(rider-editstatetid)$ >
<><>
<>
\end \define rider-text() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit" tag=div> <$transclude field="text" mode="block"/> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit" tag=div class="rider-text"> <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="cmd-enter" actions="<>" > <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="((save-tiddler))" actions="<>" > <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="((cancel-edit-tiddler))" actions="<>"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/editor" mode="inline"/> \end \define rider-ctl()
<> <> <>
\end \define rider-cancel-button() <$button tag="div" class="rider-button tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="取消修改" aria-label="Cancel text edit"> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit"> <> {{rider/escape.svg}} \end \define rider-edit-button() <$button tag="div" class="rider-button tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="编辑" aria-label="Click to toggle text edit"> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit"> <> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} \end \define rider-submit-button() <$button tag="div" class="rider-submit rider-button tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="确认修改" aria-label="Submit changes"> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit"> <> {{rider/fastarrow.svg}} \end \define rider-link() <$draggable tiddler=<> > <$button class="rider-button tc-btn-invisible" to={{!!title}} tooltip="条目链接" aria-label="Open tiddler in story">{{rider/fish-water.svg}} \end \define rider-title() <$draggable tiddler=<> class="rider-title"> <$button class="rider-button tc-btn-invisible" to={{!!title}} tooltip="打开引用条目" aria-label="Tiddler link"><$text text=<>/> \end"},"rider/readme":{"title":"rider/readme","caption":"readme","modified":"20240405112521740","tags":"rider插件","text":"''This plugin is not extensively tested. Back up any data you don't want to lose. That applies even if you aren't going to try this plugin.'' ''Rider'' is a small ~TiddlyWiki plugin for transcluding tiddlers with some in-place editing capability. ''Demo:'' https://clutterstack.github.io/can-tw/rider ''~TiddlyWiki:'' https://tiddlywiki.com ''~TiddlyWiki at ~GitHub:'' https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5 The ''Rider'' plugin exposes one macro: the ''rider'' macro, which transcludes a tiddler with a limited interface for editing in-place. !! Parameter ;tiddler : The title of the tiddler to transclude "},"rider/stylesheet优化版":{"title":"rider/stylesheet优化版","created":"20200507184921957","creator":"chris","modified":"20240504163916645","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet rider插件","text":".rider { display: block; border-right: 1px solid <>; /* 右边框 */ margin-top: 0; /* 调整外边距以避免重叠 */ margin-bottom: 1em; padding-right: 5px; /* 增加右内边距避免右边框重叠 */ } .rider-top { display: flex; justify-content: flex-end; /* 靠右对齐 */ align-items: flex-end; gap: 20px; /* 增加取消确认按钮间距 */ } .rider-title { font-size: 0.8em; margin-right: 0.4em; color: #aaaaaa; align-self: flex-end; text-decoration: none; } .rider-title:hover { color: #333333; text-decoration: none; /* 防止悬停时出现下划线 */ } .rider-button { color: #aaaaaa; } .rider-button:hover, .rider-button:hover svg { color: #333333; fill: #333333; /* 同时更改svg颜色填充 */ } .rider-button svg { width: 16px; height: 16px; flex: 0 0 auto; fill: #cccccc; } .rider-text > *, .rider > div.tc-reveal > * { margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0.5em; } .rider-textarea { width: 100%; } .rider-ctl { display: flex; flex-direction: row; }"},"rider/stylesheet原版样式备份":{"title":"rider/stylesheet原版样式备份","text":".rider { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 8fr auto; grid-template-rows: auto; border-right: 1px solid <>; padding: 0.4em 0.4em 0.4em 0; margin: 0; margin-top: -1em; } .rider-top { grid-column: 1/3; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-end; align-items: flex-end; margin: 0 -0.4em -0.4em 0; } .rider-title { font-size: 0.8em; margin-right: 0.4em; } .rider-button span.tc-reveal { vertical-align: middle; } .rider-button.rider-submit { grid-column: 2/3; } .rider-text { grid-column: 1/3; } .rider-text > :first-child, .rider > div.tc-reveal > :first-child { margin-top: 0; } .rider-text > :last-child, .rider > div.tc-reveal > :last-child { margin-bottom: 0; } .rider-textarea { width: 100%; } .rider-ctl { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } a:hover.rider-title { color: inherit; text-decoration: none; } a.rider-title { color: #aaaaaa; align-self: flex-end; } .rider-button { color: #aaaaaa; } .rider-button:hover { color: #333333; } .rider-button svg { width: 16px; height: 16px; flex: 0 0 auto; fill: #cccccc; } .rider-button:hover svg { fill: #333333; }","created":"20240419023442268","creator":"chris","modified":"20240419024240943","tags":"rider插件 样式","type":"text/css"},"rider插件":{"title":"rider插件","created":"20240405112540875","modified":"20240405112709642","tags":"Rider可编辑嵌套引用条目","text":"<>"}}}
